price: ផ្ទុយទៅវិញ បុគ្គលគ្រប់រូបមានបំណងចង់ឱ្យគេផ្ដល់គម្ពីរ ដែលរីកសុសសាយ(ដូចគម្ពីរគួរអាន)ដែរ។
arabic: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: bal yurīdu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yu'tā ṣuḥufan munasharatan
